Class User

  • java.lang.Object
    • User
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Librarian

    public class User
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    This class holds the information for a user object and also deals with the request to borrow, request to return operations, checking for updates to fine and payment history.
    Author:
    Boris Andreev and Kyriacos Mosphilis
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

            java.lang.String name,
            java.lang.String mobileNumber,
            java.lang.String houseNumber,
            java.lang.String address,
            java.lang.String postcode,
            java.lang.String image)
        Constructor for a user object.
        Parameters:
        username - Username of the user
        name - Full name of the user
        mobileNumber - Mobile number of the user
        houseNumber - House number of the user
        address - Street name, neighbourhood and city of user
        postcode - Postcode of user
        image - Path to the profile image of the user

      • checkFineHistory

        public void checkFineHistory()
        This method checks and adds the fine history of the user while collaborating with the Fine class to see if there are any new fines. It also contains checks to avoid duplication in the fine history list.

      • getFineHistory

        public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> getFineHistory()
        Getter method for the fine history of the user
        Returns:
        A list of string each an entry of the fine history of the user

      • setPaymentHistory

                              double amount)
        Setter method for the users payment history
        Parameters:
        paymentDate - The date when the user made the payment
        amount - How much did the user pay of his fine

      • getPaymentHistory

        public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> getPaymentHistory()
        Getter method for the payment history of the user
        Returns:
        A list of string with each entry being a payment made

      • calculateBalance

        public double calculateBalance()
        This method works in collaboration with the Fine class to calculate the current negative balance of the user.
        Returns:
        The negative balance on this users account

      • getBalance

        public double getBalance()
        Getter method for the users balance. It checks if the calculated negative balance has changed and if it has updates the current negative balance
        Returns:
        The total which the user owes in fines

      • payFine

        public void payFine(double payment)
        This method is used when a user pays of a part of his fine
        Parameters:
        payment - How much has the user paid towards his fine

      • requestItem

        public void requestItem(Resource item)
        This is the request item operation. When browsing the user selects an item they wan to borrow. This method carries out the check if there are free copies of this resource available for borrowing. If there are it sends to the librarian for approval, if not reserves a copy for the user.
        Parameters:
        item - The item the user wants to borrow a copy from

      • getMessages

        public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> getMessages()
        Getter method for the users messages
        Returns:
        The list of messages the user has

      • requestReturn

        public void requestReturn(Copy copy)
        This method is called when the user requests to return a copy.
        Parameters:
        copy - A copy which the user wants to return

      • DueDateMessage

        public void DueDateMessage(Copy copy)
        This method adds a message of which item the user has to return and by when. It also lets them know what the fine will be like if they fail to return on time.
        Parameters:
        copy - The item the user has to return.

      • noCopyAvailable

        public void noCopyAvailable()
        This method sends the user a notification of when there are no copies available and that they have been added to the waiting list for the item.

      • copyNowAvailable

        public void copyNowAvailable(Copy copy)
        This method sends the user a message that a copy of the item he has requested has become available.
        Parameters:
        copy - An item which the user has requested
